Author: throwaway71871127198
Text: My mom used to deliberately buy me clothes that she knew would be too small for me (like, only the smallest size the store offered when she knew i was at least two sizes up from that) and then act shocked when they wouldn’t fit. She’d be like ‘well, you know what you have to do to get them to fit!’ as if that was a normal thing to say to your 13 year old daughter.

Author: hope-world-bb
Text: when i was in 6th grade my mom bought me a ‘girdle’ and said, « look now you can actually wear these shirts i got you! »  i literally feel so bad for the child version of myself and i’m like wellp. explains why i have had a fucked up relationship w food my whole life and most of my issues stem from my mother 🤷🏻‍♀️🤷🏻‍♀️🤷🏻‍♀️
